segments.text: This kitchen looks like a typical daytime scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there's definitely more going on than meets the eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the two children conspiring near the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is quite daring, climbing onto that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar already!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of my own childhood escapades.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea what mischief is unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious she is to their secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't tip, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would certainly spoil their fun and get them caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
